languages.text: "Было близко, Ваша Светлость! Попробуете еще раз... или закончим?" {n}Что-то в улыбке флейтиста заставляет усомниться, что в эту игру можно победить. И ее хозяин, кажется, не пытается этого скрыть.{/n}

"That was close, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Would you like to play again, or... was that enough?" {n}Something in the flute player's smile makes you suspect that this game cannot be won. And the game master does not seem to be trying to hide it.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Было близко, Ваша Светлость! Попробуете еще раз... или закончим?" {n}Что-то в улыбке флейтиста заставляет усомниться, что в эту игру можно победить. И ее хозяин, кажется, не пытается этого скрыть.{/n}

"That was close, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Would you like to play again, or... is that enough?"

"That was close, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Would you like to play again, or... was that enough?" {n}Something in the flute player's smile makes you suspect that this game cannot be won. And the game master does not seem to be trying to hide it.{/n}

languages.text: « Presque, Votre Seigneurie ! Voulez-vous rejouer ou... en avez-vous assez ? » {n}Quelque chose dans le sourire du flûtiste vous fait dire qu'il est impossible de gagner et que le maître du jeu lui-même ne s'en cache pas le moins du monde.{/n}
languages.original_text: "That was close, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Would you like to play again, or... was that enough?" {n}Something in the flute player's smile makes you suspect that this game cannot be won. And the game master does not seem to be trying to hide it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Presque, Votre Seigneurie ! Voulez-vous rejouer ou... en avez-vous assez ? » {n}Quelque chose dans le sourire du flûtiste vous fait dire qu'il est impossible de gagner et que le maître du jeu lui-même ne s'en cache pas le moins du monde.{/n}

languages.text: «¡Ha estado muy reñido, mil{mf|ord|ady}! ¿Quiere echar otra partida... o ha tenido bastante ya?». {n}Hay algo en la sonrisa del flautista que te hace sospechar que no había forma de ganar. El maestro de juego no parece querer esconderlo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "That was close, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Would you like to play again, or... was that enough?" {n}Something in the flute player's smile makes you suspect that this game cannot be won. And the game master does not seem to be trying to hide it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Ha estado muy reñido, mil{mf|ord|ady}! ¿Quiere echar otra partida... o ha tenido bastante ya?». {n}Hay algo en la sonrisa del flautista que te hace sospechar que no había forma de ganar. El maestro de juego no parece querer esconderlo.{/n}

languages.text: 「惜しかったですね、陛下！もう1回やりますか？それとも…もう満足されましたか？」{n}フルート奏者の微笑みの中に、このゲームには勝てないと思わせる何かがある。そして、ゲームマスターはそれを隠そうとはしていないようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "That was close, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Would you like to play again, or... was that enough?" {n}Something in the flute player's smile makes you suspect that this game cannot be won. And the game master does not seem to be trying to hide it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「惜しかったですね、陛下！もう1回やりますか？それとも…もう満足されましたか？」{n}フルート奏者の微笑みの中に、このゲームには勝てないと思わせる何かがある。そして、ゲームマスターはそれを隠そうとはしていないようだ。{/n}

languages.text: “刚刚真是好险，大人！您想再来一局吗，还是说……到此为止？”{n}吹笛人脸上露出了意有所指的微笑。你不禁怀疑，这个游戏你根本不可能赢，而吹笛人似乎也完全没有隐瞒这一点的意图。{/n}
languages.original_text: "That was close, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Would you like to play again, or... was that enough?" {n}Something in the flute player's smile makes you suspect that this game cannot be won. And the game master does not seem to be trying to hide it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “刚刚真是好险，大人！您想再来一局吗，还是说……到此为止？”{n}吹笛人脸上露出了意有所指的微笑。你不禁怀疑，这个游戏你根本不可能赢，而吹笛人似乎也完全没有隐瞒这一点的意图。{/n}

languages.text: Das war knapp, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Wollt Ihr noch einmal spielen, oder ... reicht es Euch? {n}Irgendetwas am Lächeln des Flötenspielers sagt dir, dass du dieses Spiel nicht gewinnen kannst. Und der Spielleiter scheint das nicht einmal zu verbergen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "That was close, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Would you like to play again, or... was that enough?" {n}Something in the flute player's smile makes you suspect that this game cannot be won. And the game master does not seem to be trying to hide it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: Das war knapp, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Wollt Ihr noch einmal spielen, oder ... reicht es Euch? {n}Irgendetwas am Lächeln des Flötenspielers sagt dir, dass du dieses Spiel nicht gewinnen kannst. Und der Spielleiter scheint das nicht einmal zu verbergen.{/n}

languages.text: "Neredeyse kazanıyordunuz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Tekrar oynamak ister misiniz yoksa... Bu kadarı yeter mi?" {n}Flütçünün gülümsemesinde yatan bir şey, seni bu oyunun kazanılamayacağına dair kuşkulandırıyor. Oyunun üstadı ise bunu saklamaya bile çalışmıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "That was close, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Would you like to play again, or... was that enough?" {n}Something in the flute player's smile makes you suspect that this game cannot be won. And the game master does not seem to be trying to hide it.{/n}
